description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 19 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061948 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.
links: Lars Blomberg, Table of n, a(n) for a(n) < 10^7
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
extensions: Additional comments and more terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jun 01 2001
